title: Strange !faucet suggestion behaviour
body:
**Title:** 	 Strange !faucet suggestion behaviour

**Device:** 	 samsung SM-G935F, OS Level 23

**Memory:** 	 2077.0/3562.0 MB

**Storage:** 	 19.99/25.44 GB

**Battery:** 	 66, Unplugged

**App Version:** 	 0.9.0-72-g6fd8ec2+ (1069)

**Duration:** 	 43

**Console Log:**
```
 Handling re-frame event: :status-im.chat.handlers/set-text
01-02 21:51:26.020 D/StatusModule(24916): setSoftInputMode
01-02 21:51:26.090 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set
01-02 21:51:26.140 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set
01-02 21:51:26.170 D/ViewRootImpl(24916): MSG_RESIZED: ci=Rect(0, 96 - 0, 0) vi=Rect(0, 96 - 0, 0) or=1
01-02 21:51:26.190 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set
01-02 21:51:26.200 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set-layout-height
01-02 21:51:26.250 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set
01-02 21:51:30.220 D/ViewRootImpl(24916): ViewPostImeInputStage processPointer 0
01-02 21:51:30.310 D/ViewRootImpl(24916): ViewPostImeInputStage processPointer 1
01-02 21:51:30.320 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set-chat-ui-props
01-02 21:51:30.320 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :switch-command-suggestions!
01-02 21:51:30.320 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set-chat-input-text
01-02 21:51:30.320 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :status-im.chat.handlers/check-input-for-commands
01-02 21:51:30.320 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :status-im.chat.handlers/check-suggestions
01-02 21:51:30.330 D/ReactNativeJS(24916): DEBUG [status-im.chat.handlers:140] - Suggestions:  ([:browse :color #ffa500, :fullscreen true, :has-handler false, :name browse, :params [:name url, :type text], :suggestions-trigger on-send, :type :command] [:faucet :description Get some ETH, :color #7099e6, :name faucet, :params [:name url, :placeholder Faucet URL, :type text], :type :command, :title Faucet, :registered-only true, :has-handler false, :suggestions-trigger on-change] [:phone :description Find friends using your number, :color #5bb2a2, :name phone, :params [:name phone, :placeholder Phone number, :type phone], :type :command, :icon phone_white, :title Send Phone Number, :has-handler false, :suggestions-trigger on-change])
01-02 21:51:30.330 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :animate-command-suggestions
01-02 21:51:30.330 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :status-im.chat.handlers/set-text
01-02 21:51:30.490 W/DisplayListCanvas(24916): DisplayListCanvas is started on unbinded RenderNode (without mOwningView)
01-02 21:51:30.540 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set
01-02 21:51:30.640 I/ReactNativeJS(24916): Handling re-frame event: :set
01-02 21:51:34.920 I/INSTABUG - a(24916): invokeGeneral
01-02 21:51:34.920 I/Timeline(24916): Timeline: Activity_launch_request id:im.status.ethereum time:95347218
01-02 21:51:34.980 D/SensorManager(24916): unregisterListener ::   
01-02 21:51:34.980 D/RelationGraph(24916): garbageCollect()
01-02 21:51:34.980 W/ResourcesManager(24916): getTopLevelResources: /data/app/im.status.ethereum-1/base.apk / 1.0 running in im.status.ethereum rsrc of package im.status.ethereum

```

**Current View:** 	 im.status.ethereum.MainActivity



**Non Image Attachments:** 	[non image attachment](https://s3.amazonaws.com/instabug-pro/states/files/44141594/attachment_files/3da6822429f458a04147575e7a7a4db9_original.mp4?1483368751)

When tapping on a suggestion, it minimises the keyboard and nothing happens. Also Zerogox behaves very strangely, maybe we should remove it since we obviously can't support it properly.

If it's possible to have some feedback in the request message (like maybe "Your account has been credited with X") lets do it

Hm.
I guess it is not a faucet bug, and it is not a bug at all â€” you need to tap at suggestion twice. The first tap moves the focus from the input, and the second tap selects the item. I am going to check for any possible solutions to make everything work without double-tapping (hope this solution will help: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/36476542/react-native-requires-two-taps-to-change-input-focus-when-within-scrollview)
